```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
```

## Problem 1

Read Mr. Trashwheel dataset 

```{r}
trashwheel_df = 
  read_xlsx(
    "./Trash-Wheel-Collection-Totals-8-6-19.xlsx", 
      sheet = "Mr. Trash Wheel", 
      range = cell_cols("A:N") %>% 
    janitor::clean_names() %>% 
    drop_na(dumpster) %>% 
    mutate(
        sports_balls - round(sports_balls),
        sports_balls = as.integer(sports_balls)
    ))

```
readxl assumes front one unless specify
